About the job
Full Stack Developer – Mission-Critical Systems

We are seeking a talented Full Stack Developer to join our high-performing technology team building and maintaining systems and infrastructure that power our commodities exchange and clearing house.
In this role, you will work alongside experienced engineers in a collaborative and demanding environment, contributing to the development and operation of mission-critical platforms that support real-time trading and clearing services. You will also be instrumental in ensuring system reliability, scalability, and performance across our technology stack.

Key Responsibilities:
Engineer the Backbone of the Marketplace: Design, build, and maintain high-performance systems that support the daily operations of our exchange and clearing house.
Drive Innovation and Business Expansion: Deliver IT solutions that enable new product offerings and accelerate our reach into diverse markets and geographies.
Empower Business Through Technology: Partner with business and control teams to streamline workflows and unlock efficiencies through smart, scalable solutions.
Lead Cloud-Native Deployments: Manage enterprise-grade applications on containerized AWS infrastructure, ensuring resilience, scalability, and cost-effectiveness.
Champion Cybersecurity Excellence: Embed security-by-design principles into every layer of our technology stack, reinforcing our defences against evolving threats.
Optimize for Performance and Insight: Implement metrics and observability tools to monitor system health, analyse resource usage, and continuously enhance performance.
Be the Technical Guardian: Provide expert-level support to swiftly resolve incidents and maintain system stability across mission-critical environments.
Stay Ahead of the Curve: Keep pace with emerging technologies, industry trends, and security standards to ensure our platform remains a leader in innovation.

Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree or higher in Science, Engineering, or a related field.
Minimum of 2 years as a Full Stack Developer, with a proven track record in delivering mission-critical systems.
Strong foundation in building distributed server-side systems within a microservices architecture.
Advanced skills in React and its ecosystem.
Experience with AWS is a plus.
Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
Solid understanding of data structures, algorithms, database, and software design principles.
Team player with effective communication and collaboration abilities
Comfortable working in a fast-paced, high-stakes environment

Abaxx is building Smarter Markets: markets powered by better tools, benchmarks, and technology to meet today’s biggest challenges, including the energy transition.

Abaxx Exchange delivers new market infrastructure to support this shift, introducing centrally-cleared, physically-deliverable futures contracts across LNG, carbon, battery materials, and gold. Designed for traders and commercial participants, these contracts provide reliable price discovery, more precise hedging instruments, and the ability to optimize physical supply chains, establishing the next generation of global commodity benchmarks.

Licensed as a Recognised Market Operator (RMO) and an Approved Clearinghouse (ACH) by the Monetary Authority of Singapore, Abaxx Exchange is purpose-built to meet the commercial needs of today’s energy, environmental, battery materials, and precious metals markets.
